Texto: 
ap chest x-ray demonstrates bilateral perihilar confluent nodular opacities.
kaposi sarcoma of lung
pcp
48 year old man with past medical history of aids, hepatitis b and kaposi's sarcoma presents with shortness of breath and cough.  pt was treated one month prior for a presumptive diagnosis of pcp, but symptoms worsened despite treatment.
